extract_feature(image)[source]

It does extract the feature from the input. Framework, model and layer HAVE TO be already set with their set methods. :param image: the data of the image preprocessed :return: a numpy array that will be put in a .npy file calling the right Dataset Class’ method

set_model(model)[source]
Parameters:

model_name – is the name of the model to use.

Returns: nothing but it initializes the protected model attribute, later used for extraction :param model:
